labels.AccumulateResultsHelp: The report will include the previous scheduled data
labels.DetailbyAccountwithCustomerPO: Detail by Account with Customer PO
labels.ScheduleReportsHelp:
● Yearly reports run on January 1st and include data from the prior year
● Quarterly reports run the 1st day of each quarter and include data from the prior quarter
● Monthly reports run the 1st day of each month and include data from the prior month
● Weekly reports run each Saturday and include data from the prior week
● Daily reports run each morning and include data from the prior day
labels.dateRangeErrorThreeYear: Please select a date range of 3 years or less.
labels.insightPartnerData: Selecting to include Partner Data will include purchase activity which Insight collects from our partner alliances in locations around the world. Partner Data is uploaded bi-weekly, monthly or quarterly depending on region
labels.saveTemplateLabel: Save Report Definition as Report Template
labels.missingEmailAddressError: Please enter at least one email address.
labels.enterEnglishOnly: Please enter English characters when specifying an email address or report name
labels.missingSmartTrackerError: Account Number, Account Name and Order Number are required to run the report .
labels.AccountsunderthecurrentreportingParent: Accounts under the current reporting Parent
labels.We migrated Renewal reports to the Renew: We migrated Renewal reports to the Renewal and Warranty Manager, which is accessible from the Tools menu. If you don’t have the Renewal and Warranty Manager activated, please request access through your account executive.
labels.dateRangeError: Please select a date range of one year or less.
labels.reportDeliveryOptions:
Our reports are available in many report delivery options and formats.
● Report Now: Run the report immediately and view results in the selected format.
● Schedule Report: Easily schedule the report to run automatically based on the selected criteria. View the report schedules under Report Mangement.
● Save in Posted Reports: Save the report to our system for easy access later. Access Posted Reports at your convenience under Report Mangement.
● Save as Template: Save the report criteria for future use. Access Saved Templates under Report Mangement.
● reportDeliveryOptions: The selected date format will determine the display of dates in your report.
labels.accountNumberNameOrderNumberMissingError: Account number, Account name, Order number, Order line number, Invoice number and Invoice line number are required to run the report.
labels.CustomFileNameFormat: The Custom Name will be appended with "_YYYYMMDD_HHMMSS" to ensure that the report file name is unique
labels.currOptCurrBillAcc: Display all transactions in the currency of the billing account
labels.endDateStartDateError: End date cannot be older than start date

labels.serialNumAssetTag: By default, serial number and asset tag information is displayed in one cell.  You can choose to display the information on separate lines by selecting the checkbox.

labels.smartTrackerIcon: SmartTracker is custom data captured for our clients during the ordering process to allow for customized record-keeping for each customer. This service can assist a company in tracking and auditing internally to maintain license compliance and other internal reporting functions.
labels.deliveryDateFormatLabel: Select a date format for the report output
labels.regionHelpText:
● Selecting an Operations Center will limit your transactions to the selected Operations Center(s).
 ‐ Insight APAC will limit your transactions to Asia Pacific
 ‐ Insight EMEA will limit your transactions to Europe, Middle East and Africa
 ‐ Insight North America will limit your transactions to United States and Canada
● Use the Region filter to further customize your results and choose “Update Filter Selections“ to apply your selections
labels.invalidEmailAddressError: At least one email entered is invalid.
